1.「元ポツコン２号じゃねえですかッ！| いいところに 来ましたッ！| ちょっと こ: Isn't that former POTUS 2? You've come to the|right place! Take a look at this!

2.「こいつは あの遺跡で拾ってきた| 魔神兵とかいうガラクタの 一部なんですがね。: This is a piece of junk we picked up at the|ruins, a demon soldier or something. If you|sit here like this...

3.「イタタタッ！ 見てくだせえッ！| とがった部分が しりっぺたの先に当たって……: Ouch! Look at this! The pointy part hits the|tip of my butt... Ouch! That's what happens!

4.「ここにある たいがいのもんは| イスぐらいには なりますが| こいつは イスに: Most of the things in here can be used as|chairs, but this one can't even be used as a|chair...

5.「こりゃ正真正銘の ガラクタでごぜえますよッ！| こんな すばらしい物に めぐり: It's a real piece of junk! I'm the luckiest|man alive to have come across such a|wonderful thing!

8.「わわっ！ ダ ダストンさまっ！| こいつ ガラクタのくせに しゃべってますよ！: Whoa! Daston! He's a piece of junk, but he's|talking!

9.「エネルギー限界。| 凍眠室 内部 危険。凍眠室 内部 危険……。: Energy... Inside the hibernation chamber...|Inside the hibernation chamber, danger...

10.「緊急回避 装置 起動。| 凍眠機能…… 解除 シマス。: Emergency evasion device... Freeze sleep|function... Deactivation ...

11.「さ さすがの わしでも| 死体は 勘弁でごぜえますよ……？: But even I don't want a dead body...

14.「……ほほう。ウルベアの魔の手より| 余を救ってくれたのは そちたちじゃな。|: ...... It was you who saved me from the|clutches of Urbear. Suffer... Praise me...

15.「い いきなり出てきて エラそうに……。| アンタ いったい 何者でごぜえますか: You come out of nowhere and act like you're|all... Who the hell are you? !

16.「これは 異なことを……。| ドワーフでありながら 余を知らぬとな？| ……まあ: This is a strange thing... You're a dwarf and|you don't know me? I... Well... I am|generous...

17.「ならば 我が名を聞いて おそれおののくのだ！| 余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統: Then hear my name, and be terrified! I am|Biang Dao, the rightful heir to the throne of|Gateria, the First Prince!

19.「あ…あまり反応が ないな。| ……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。: Uh... He's not responding very well. ...|Well... I'm generous.

20.「おおっ！ そうじゃッ！| こうしては おれん！| 囚われの リウ老師を救わねば: Oh! Yes! This is not how I want it! I have to|save Master Liu!

21.「そち！ 奇妙な身なりをしているものの| なかなか ウデが立つと見たぞよ。| 余: There! Despite your strange appearance, you|seem to be quite skilled... Would you do me a|favor?

22.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: The truth is, in the Urbea Underground|Empire, my tutor, a man named Liu, is being|held prisoner just as I am.

23.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: So, will you help me get to the Urbere|Underground Empire and rescue Master Liu? Of|course you'll get your reward!

24.「うむ！ 苦しゅうない！| そち 名は なんと申す？| ……そうか <pc>と申: Mmm! It's not painful! What's your name, boy?|I... I see.<pc> と...

25.「それでは <pc>よ！| 反重力飛行装置を 持ってまいれ！| ウルベアまで ひ: In that case<pc> Hey! Let's get the anti-gravity flight gear!|Let's make a quick trip to Urbea!

27.「……コホン。どうした？| 反重力飛行装置を 知らぬわけではあるまい？| ほれ: ...... What's up? You've never heard of an|anti-gravity flight device? You see, it|allows you to fly freely in the sky, a...

28.「まさか……！| ここには 反重力飛行装置がないと申すか！？<yesno><cl: No way. You're telling me there's no anti-|gravity flight equipment here?<yesno><close>

29.「ちょっと 元ポツコン２号さん！| この部屋にあるのは ガラクタだけで| そんな: Hey, Ex-Potballer #2! All we have in this|room is junk, and there's no way it's useful!

30.「言われてみれば 確かに……。| ここにいる者の身なりは 相当 貧相……。| こ: It's true, if you ask me... The people here|are very poorly dressed... This is a part of|the favela...

31.「すまぬ。余の配慮が 足りなかったわ。| ならば いたしかたなし。| 地下帝国ま: I'm sorry. I was not considerate enough. Then|I have no choice. We'll reach the underground|empire on foot...

32.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: In that case<pc> Okay. I'll lead you to the Urbea Underground|Empire. I'll follow you...

33.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: Once we reach Urbea, we'll head|underground... Master Liu is being held in a|secret room on the third basement floor.

34.「……ムムッ！| そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており| 余の頼みは 受: ... Mmm! You have so many requests from your|people that you cannot accept mine.

35.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: ... Well... I am forgiving. However, the|situation is urgent. I need you to help me|with something as soon as possible.

36.「なんと！ 余の頼みを 断ると申すか！| 我がガテリア皇国の威光を| おそれぬ者: How dare you! You dare to refuse my request?|How could there be anyone who does not fear|the prestige of my Empire of Gateria?

37.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。| とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ。: ... Well... I am forgiving. However, the|situation is urgent. If you change your mind,|come back.

38.「おお 待っておったぞ！| ここにいる者に まともに話せる者はおらぬ。| 頼みの: Oh, I've been waiting for you! There is no|one here who can speak properly. I'm counting|on you...

39.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 余: The truth is, in the Urbea Underground|Empire, my tutor, a man named Liu, is being|held prisoner just as I am.

40.「そこで 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしてくれ: So, will you help me get to the Urbere|Underground Empire and rescue Master Liu? Of|course you'll get your reward!

41.「じつはな ウルベア地下帝国には| 余の家庭教師をつとめる リウという男が| 囚: The truth is, in the Urbea Underground|Empire, my tutor, a man named Liu, is being|held captive...

42.「そちには 余を ウルベア地下帝国まで導き| リウ老師を救出する 手助けをしても: You are to lead me to the Urbere Underground|Empire and help me rescue Master Liu.

43.「ウルベアに着いたら 地下を目指すのじゃ。| 地下３階辺りにある 奥まった部屋に: Once we reach Urbea, we'll head|underground... Master Liu is being held in a|secret room on the third basement floor.

45.「それでは <pc>よ。| ウルベア地下帝国まで 案内を頼む。| 余は そちの後: In that case<pc> Okay. I'll lead you to the Urbea Underground|Empire. I'll follow you...

46.「ハア ハア……。待ちや <pc>。| いったい どれほど 余を歩かせるのじゃ？: Huh, huh, huh... Wait.<pc> I'll be back. How long will you make me walk?|I'm not used to walking...

47.「ところで <pc>よ。| そちは 来る場所を まちがえておらぬか？: by the way<pc> You've come to the wrong place. Are you sure|you're not in the wrong place?

48.「進めども 進めども ガレキの山……。| 余の知っておる ウルベア地下帝国は|: On and on we go... until we come to a pile of|rubble. The Urbea Underground Empire I knew|was not in ruins like this, was it?

49.「深く 広く 掘られた空洞には| 虹色に輝く宝石で 装飾された家屋が並び| 頭上: Deep and wide, the cavernous hollow is lined|with houses decorated with iridescent jewels,|and overhead, anti-gravity flying machines...

51.「ならば なぜ かような場所に| 余を 連れてきた！| 連れてきたには それなり: Then why did you bring me to a place like|this? You brought me here for a good reason!

52.「これは異なことを……。余は 信じられぬ。| あの 栄華を誇った地下帝国が| な: This is a strange thing. I don't believe it.|How could such a glorious, underground empire|have come to look like this?

53.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに|この場所が ウルベア地下帝国の|遺跡であることを伝え: <pc> The first person to tell Biang Dao that this|place is the remains of the Urbea Underground|Empire...

54.「なん…じゃと……！？| ここは ウルベア地下帝国の遺跡じゃと？| 遺跡というこ: What the... So...? Are you saying that these|are the ruins of the Urbea Underground|Empire? Ruins, you mean...

55.「ウルベアは すでに滅んで……| このありさまに……。: Urbea is already dead... And now this...

56.「なんということじゃ……。| 余は…… 余は かの帝国が滅びるまで| 魔神兵の中: Oh, my God... I... I slept in a demon|soldier's body until the Empire was|destroyed?

57.「な ならば ガテリアは どうじゃ！？| <pc>よ！ そちは ガテリア皇国の|: Well, then, how about gateria?<pc> Hey! Do you know what will become of the|Empire of Gateria?<yesno><close>

58.「おおっ！ 知っておると申すか！| ならば 余に 話してみい！| ガテリアは 今: Oh! You know what I'm talking about! Then|tell me! What's going on in Gateria now?

59.「…………………………。| 何も 答えられぬではないか。| クチから出まかせを: ... I can't answer any of your questions...|Don't tell me what to do!

60.「……そうか。何も 知らぬのじゃな。| すなわち ガテリアも ウルベア同様| も: ...... I don't know anything... I mean,|Gateria, like Urbea, is no longer here...

61.「父上も 母上も もう……。| そんな…… そんな…………。: Your father, your mother, they're... I|can't... Oh, no...

62.「……すまぬ。一国の皇子である 余が| 情けない姿を さらしてしもうた……。|: ...... I'm the prince of a nation, and I've|made a shameful spectacle of myself... Please|forgive me.<pc> Yo.

63.「だが そちの話を聞いて| あらゆることに 合点がいったわ。: But when I heard what you said, everything|made sense...

64.「下々の者が ガテリアの威光に ひれふさぬのも| 反重力飛行装置を 目にしないの:
It's why the lowlifes don't bow down to|Gateria's authority, why they don't see the|anti-gravity flying machines, why the|
|costumes of those passing by are so|strange...

65.「すべて 時の流れの中で| 我らの文明が 失われてしまったため……。: All because in the course of time, our|civilization was lost...

66.「……つまりは グルヤンラシュ！| きゃつの思い通りになったということか……！: ... In other words, Guru Yanrash! You mean|you've done what Kyatsu wanted...

67.「……<pc> そちに聞かせたい話がある。| 余が この時代に来る前の話じゃ……: <pc> There's a story I'd like to tell you. It was|before I came into this world.

68.「かつて この大陸には ふたつの大国があった。| 余が 国王となるはずだった ガ:
There were once two great powers on this|continent... I was to be the king of|Gateri... And here in the Urbere|
|underground...

69.「ふたつの国は 他の種族を圧倒する技術力を有し| そこに住まう者たちは なに不自: The two nations have technological|superiority over all other races, and their|inhabitants live in peace and harmony.

70.「あの乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュが| ウルベア地下帝国に 現れるまでは……！: That is, until Gul'yann Rush, the wicked|emissary of the turbulent world, appeared in|the Urbea Underground Empire.

71.「グルヤンラシュは 高潔な神官の身なりで現れ| ウルベア皇帝に取り入ると| ふた:
Gul'yan Rash appeared in the guise of an|honorable priest, and took advantage of the|Emperor of Urbea to set up a war between the|
|two great powers...

72.「その戦いの中 多くの技術者が散り| たがいの技術と技術が ぶつかり合って| 我:
In the midst of this war, many engineers were|scattered, and as technology clashed with|technology, our civilization was slowly|
|dying.

73.「……そう！ 我らの文明の喪失は| すべて グルヤンラシュの奸計によるもの！|: ... Yes! The loss of our civilization is|entirely due to the schemes of Gurjarash! He|has led us both to our doom!

74.「……そして 行き過ぎた 戦いの果てに| 余は 命の危険に さらされた。| それ: ... And I was in danger of dying because of|my excessive fighting. And it was Master Liu|who saved me.

75.「父上も母上も もう生きては いまい。| じゃが リウ老師だけは| 今も どこか: Your father and mother are no longer alive.|But Master Liu, he's still alive somewhere.

76.「老師は 余が この時代に来る前に| 余の後を追って 魔神兵に乗ると| 約束して: The old master promised to follow me and ride|the demon army before I came to this time...

77.「じゃが ここに老師は いない様子……。| 余は ひとまず あのガラクタ屋敷に戻: But I don't think the master is here. I think|I'll go back to that junk yard and think|about what to do next.

78.「<pc>よ これは ほうびじゃ。| この時代に価値があるかは わからぬが| あ: <pc> Well, this is... I don't know what it's worth|in this day and age, but I'll take it.

79.「<pc>……。| そちは 信頼に値する者だと わかった。| 余が 困ったときは: <pc> ... I know you're worthy of my trust. If I'm|ever in trouble, you can help me again.

80.「リウ老師……。| そなたは どこへ行ったのだ？| 余を 時の激流に 押しやった: Master Liu... Where have you gone? You're|still pushing me through the raging waters of|time.
